title: Website will not allow Firefox to display the page if another site has embedded it
content:
Website will not allow Firefox to display the page if another site has embedded it

Firefox Can’t Open This Page

To protect your security, rabbitstream.net will not allow Firefox to display the page if another site has embedded it. To see this page, you need to open it in a new window.
creator: twistoffate15061973

title: Change interface font and size
content: Hello, I wanted to know where I can change the font size of the interface "not the page font" and if there is a way to change the size of the browser tab.
creator: briancordeiro

title: persistent recommend extensions on the toolbar
content:
re-installed firefox today after a few months of ungoogled chromium and noticed the inability to move, say, the ublock origin icon/app on the toolbar to the extensions toolbar folder due to the recommend extensions program which is seemingly new? the new making-the-recommended-extensions-from-the-toolbar-unmoveable-unremovable, i mean

like, can you not?
